@psspss Yeah, I'm surprised absolutely nobody from the scene has released it - usually DHD, KILLERS, CRiMSON, or even 2HD (since they did Jungle Gold) are on top of things.

Let people learn, they should really read NFO files, they're there for a reason.

And actually, the cropping is correct - SD channels like Discovery usually do 16:9 letterbox, thus putting black bars around it. Stuff like the show rating and channel logo are half on the actual show and the other half are on the black bars that contain nothing - so we cut the black out, as nobody wants it (reference that Gold Rush special we released at 640x480 to see how it's half on half not) HD channels have it completely on, which we haven't got.

Long story short, we will continue cropping part of the logo off as long as it's on the 16:9 letterbox bars rather than the video. All of the video remains intact.
